description:
This is an introductory course on the Enneagram. It is self-guided and should take 3-4 hours to complete in as many sessions as you would like. It is structured by 11 lectures about 15 minutes each and 2 videos with the instructors. The 9 lectures on each enneatype follow a standard structure developed by the instructors who have over 30 combined years of experience with the Enneagram.

You should take this course if you are interested in learning about the enneagram. Or if you are interested in personality types, personal growth, compassion, or ego-transcendence. This is the first step toward more deeply understanding yourself, your loved ones, and others in your life!
title: The Enneagram: Nine Types In Depth
instructors: Tammy Hendrix, LCSW, Lissa Friedman, PhD
